name: Elevator Impossible
description:
ANTISTRESS game !

Feel frustrated ? Your life seems like a trash ?
With this game you will realize your live is a piece of cake.

Its all about elevators !

Time management game with emphasis on management.
Fun, addictive yet simply (but not easy! ) game.

Arrows, WASD and X to control.

#elevatorjam

music by:
Goto80, RoccoW

Game is still in beta stage, its not a final product.
